title: A discourse of infallibility with Mr. Thomas White's answer to it, and a reply to him / by Sir Lucius Cary late Lord Viscount of Falkland ; also Mr. Walter Mountague (Abbot of Nanteul) his letter against Protestantism and his Lordship's answer thereunto, with Mr. John Pearson's preface.
author: Falkland, Lucius Cary, Viscount, 1610?-1643.
notes: Edited by Thomas Triplet. cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
